question: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.You have a full-time job and you are also doing a part-time evening course.You now find that you cannot continue the course.Write a letter to your teachers. In your letterdescribe the situationexplain why you cannot continue at this timesay what action you would like to takeYou do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear ................. ,
text: I am writing to inform you  that I want to take an  off from the computer networking course which I have started under you.
I would like to  explain you that I am working full time in a Tim Horton restaurant and I am doing a computer networking course at the weekend.

However, nowadays it is difficult for me to manage time for study since it is  Christmas month. I am working seven days  a week. Thus, I do not get time to  complete assignments which makes me sad because  I want to complete this course as soon as possible to get my dream job.

I would greatly appreciate it if you could give me 1 month  off from the course. I want to  focus on studying and learning everything. Therefore, it would be a great idea if we will start it again in January. I will take  holidays from my job  to complete my December month assignments.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
